title: Buffalo Wings
steps: Pat wings dry. Toss with baking powder and salt.
Arrange on wire rack over sheet. Refrigerate uncovered overnight.
Bake at 450°F for 20 minutes. Flip, bake 20-30 more until crispy.
Melt butter, whisk in hot sauce, vinegar, Worcestershire.
Serve with blue cheese and celery.
notes: Baking powder + overnight = crispy without frying.
Frank's is classic; adjust heat with more/less sauce.
